name: player_practice
expected_query: with "tbd8c74d27e01b1db918b77f0f1232dca" as (select "pid", "game_designation", "roster_status", "inj", "m", "tu", "w", "th", "f", "s", "su" from "practice" where "year" in (${current_season.year}) and "week" in (${current_season.week})) select "player"."pid", "tbd8c74d27e01b1db918b77f0f1232dca"."game_designation" AS "practice_game_designation_0", "tbd8c74d27e01b1db918b77f0f1232dca"."inj" AS "practice_injury_0", "tbd8c74d27e01b1db918b77f0f1232dca"."m" AS "player_practice_designation_m_0", "tbd8c74d27e01b1db918b77f0f1232dca"."tu" AS "player_practice_designation_tu_0", "tbd8c74d27e01b1db918b77f0f1232dca"."w" AS "player_practice_designation_w_0", "tbd8c74d27e01b1db918b77f0f1232dca"."th" AS "player_practice_designation_th_0", "tbd8c74d27e01b1db918b77f0f1232dca"."f" AS "player_practice_designation_f_0", "tbd8c74d27e01b1db918b77f0f1232dca"."s" AS "player_practice_designation_s_0", "tbd8c74d27e01b1db918b77f0f1232dca"."su" AS "player_practice_designation_su_0", "player"."pos" from "player" left join "tbd8c74d27e01b1db918b77f0f1232dca" on "tbd8c74d27e01b1db918b77f0f1232dca"."pid" = "player"."pid" group by "tbd8c74d27e01b1db918b77f0f1232dca"."game_designation", "tbd8c74d27e01b1db918b77f0f1232dca"."inj", "tbd8c74d27e01b1db918b77f0f1232dca"."m", "tbd8c74d27e01b1db918b77f0f1232dca"."tu", "tbd8c74d27e01b1db918b77f0f1232dca"."w", "tbd8c74d27e01b1db918b77f0f1232dca"."th", "tbd8c74d27e01b1db918b77f0f1232dca"."f", "tbd8c74d27e01b1db918b77f0f1232dca"."s", "tbd8c74d27e01b1db918b77f0f1232dca"."su", "player"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 2 DESC NULLS LAST, "player"."pid" asc limit 500
